results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-7f66866f4c-scmwq], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints because the expected pod is not running or ready.

Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs [pod-name]`. 3. Verify pod readiness probes. 4. Ensure service selector matches pod labels. 5. Restart pod if necessary.

results.name: default/wordpress-7f66866f4c-scmwq

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
